description:
This programming software is a user friendly tool designed to allow quick programming of CLICK PLCs.
The simple operation of this software allows users to quickly develop a ladder logic program for the CLICK PLCs. The 
online help file is designed to provide information that will help you get acquainted with the software quickly.
It is highly recommended that users read all the introductory information before using this software. This information 
includes details on warnings, system compatibility, technical support and other important information.
author: AutomationDirect.com,  Inc.
